trans-unit.source: Provides panels on each side of the form and a central panel that can hold one or more controls.
ToolStripContainer is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

It uses four docked side panels (instances of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) and one central panel (an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) to create a typical arrangement.

You cannot remove the side panels, but you can hide them by setting their respective <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> properties to `false`.
By default, each of these properties is `true` at design time.
Also at design time, the ToolStripContainer appears with its top panel already expanded.
You can neither remove nor hide the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.

You can arrange one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls in the side panels, and you can use the central panel for other controls.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> also provides a way to get renderer support into the body of your form for a consistent appearance.
ToolStripContainer does not support Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> for MDI applications.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> class.

To be added.
Gets the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.

Use the BottomToolStripPanel property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> representing the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible.
Set the BottomToolStripPanelVisible property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a bottom panel.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
This property is not relevant for this class.
This property is not relevant for this class.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control causes validation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.CausesValidation*> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
To be added.
Gets the center panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.

You can use the top, bottom, left, and right panels of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> to hold <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls.

Controls other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> are automatically added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref> representing the center panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
This property is not relevant for this class.
This property is not relevant for this class.
The ContextMenuStrip associated with this control.
Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.ContextMenuStrip*> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

This property is not relevant for this class.

Gets the left panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.

Use the LeftToolStripPanel property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> representing the left panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the left panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible.
Set the LeftToolStripPanelVisible property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a left panel.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the left panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged"></xref> event.
The event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The OnSizeChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
Gets the right panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.

Use the RightToolStripPanel property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> representing the right panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the right panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible.
Set the RightToolStripPanelVisible property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a right panel.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the right panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets the top panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.

Use the TopToolStripPanel property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> representing the top panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the top panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible.
Set the TopToolStripPanelVisible property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a top panel.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the top panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
